1.name: Flower of Eden
1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

3.name: Grace of Helios
3.effect: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Descent of Divinity
4.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

5.name: Tide of Hadean
5.effect: Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Dust of Purification
6.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

Albedo.description: Albedo — an alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius."Genius," "Kreideprinz," or "Captain of the Investigation Team"... Such titles and honors are of no consequence to him when there is so much more research to conduct.The pursuit of fortune and connections cannot hold a candle to his heart's desire — acquiring the limitless, obscure knowledge left behind by previous generations of scholars.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Star of Another World
1.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

2.name: Star of Another World
2.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

3.name: Star of Another World
3.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

4.name: Star of Another World
4.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

5.name: Star of Another World
5.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

6.name: Star of Another World
6.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

Aloy.description: An outcast since birth, Aloy grew up in a harsh mountain wilderness near the tribe that shunned her. Fostered by an expert hunter, she trained to hunt with cat-like grace and deadly accuracy – but the things she most wanted to learn, he could not teach her. Most of all, she burned to know the circumstances of her birth – who her parents were, and why she was shunned by the tribe.Her quest for answers swept her into a wider and more dangerous world than she ever could have imagined. She encountered strange and powerful new tribes, ancient ruins rife with mysteries, and dangerous enemies, both human and machine.Eventually she learned that her origins and destiny were deeply tied to the fate of the world itself, and fought an epic battle to save it against the evil forces of an artificial intelligence from the ancient past.She thought that this would be the end of her journey. But there is always more to an adventurer's tale. She has now come to Teyvat in search of a new challenges.In this brave new world, Aloy is ready for the hunt!Description from Official Announcement[1]

1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
1.effect: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

2.name: Bunny Triggered
2.effect: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

3.name: It Burns!
3.effect: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
4.effect: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
5.effect: Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Wildfire
6.effect: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

Amber.description: A perky, straightforward girl, who is also the only Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. Her amazing mastery of the glider has made her a three-time winner of the Gliding Championship in Mondstadt. As a rising star within the Knights of Favonius, Amber is always ready for any challenging tasks.Description from the Official Website[1]

talents.name: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!

Arataki Itto.description: Fast as the wind and mighty as thunder, he is an intrepid man with Oni blood running through his veins.Official Character Introduction[1]

1.name: Gleeful Songs
1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

2.name: Vitality Burst
2.effect: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

3.name: Star of Tomorrow
3.effect: Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Attentiveness be My Power
4.effect: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

5.name: The Purest Companionship
5.effect: Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
6.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
Automatically revives the fallen character.
Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

Barbara.description: The Deaconess of the Favonius Church and a shining starlet adored by all. Although the concept of a starlet is rather novel in a city of bards, the people of Mondstadt love Barbara nonetheless. "I owe everything to the city's spirit of freedom" — Barbara, regarding her popularity.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
1.effect: When Stormbreaker is used:Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
2.effect: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

3.name: Summoner of Storm
3.effect: Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Stunning Revenge
4.effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
5.effect: Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Bane of Evil
6.effect: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

Beidou.description: Captain of the Crux, with quite the reputation in Liyue.There are those who say she can split mountains and part the sea. Others say she draws lightning through her sword. Some say that even the mightiest of sea beasts are no match for her.For those not from Liyue, it may sound like a hearty joke, but those that have sailed with her will say—"No matter what sea beasts there may be, Beidou will be sure to split them all in two."Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Grand Expectation
1.effect: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

2.name: Impasse Conqueror
2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
3.effect: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
4.effect: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

5.name: True Explorer
5.effect: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Fire Ventures with Me
6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

Bennett.description: One of the few young adventurers of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild, he is always plagued with inexplicable bad luck.He is the only active member of his own adventure group, known as "Benny's Adventure Team," after all the other members decided to "take leave" following a series of unfortunate incidents. As a result, the team is currently on the verge of being dissolved.Being unable to break the poor boy's heart, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild has kept "Benny's Adventure Team" on the books, whilst also hiding from him the fact that all the other members have long since officially left the team.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Ice Unleashed
1.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
2.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

3.name: Cloudburst
3.effect: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Frozen Skies
4.effect: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.This effect can only occur once every 2s.

5.name: The True Path
5.effect: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Rally of Four Blades
6.effect: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

Chongyun.description: An exorcist who roams the land with Liyue as his base of operations, evil spirits fleeing wherever he goes. As the heir to a clan of exorcists, he has always possessed abilities superior to most. However, these abilities are not the result of training, but of an inborn trait — a pure yang spirit.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Conviction
1.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

2.name: Searing Ember
2.effect: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

3.name: Fire and Steel
3.effect: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Flowing Flame
4.effect: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

5.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
5.effect: Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
6.effect: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

Diluc.description: As the wealthiest gentleman in Mondstadt, the ever-dapper Diluc always presents himself as the epitome of perfection. But behind the courteous visage burns a zealous soul that has sworn to protect Mondstadt at all costs, allowing him to mercilessly vanquish all who threaten his city.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: A Lingering Flavor
1.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
2.effect: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

3.name: A—Another Round?
3.effect: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
4.effect: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

5.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
5.effect: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
6.effect:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

Diona.description: The incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern, rising star of Mondstadt's wine industry, and the greatest challenger to its traditional powerhouses.A feisty feline young lady from Springvale, any drink mixed by Diona's hand tastes delicious beyond belief.Yet given her extreme distaste for alcohol, is her talent a blessing or a curse?Description from the Official Website[1]

obtain: Event Wish - Born of Ocean Swell

1.name: Tidal Illusion
1.effect: Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

2.name: Lady of Seafoam
2.effect: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Tapping CD.

3.name: Lawrence Pedigree
3.effect: Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
4.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

5.name: Chivalric Quality
5.effect: Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Noble Obligation
6.effect: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

Eula.description: A rebellious descendant of the old aristocracy who is always out on the battlefield.As one born into the old aristocracy, carrying the bloodline of sinners, Eula has needed a unique approach to the world to navigate the towering walls of prejudice peacefully. Of course, this did not prevent her from severing ties with her clan. As the outstanding Spindrift Knight, she hunts down Mondstadt's enemies in the wild to exact her unique "vengeance."Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Gaze of the Deep
1.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

2.name: Devourer of All Sins
2.effect: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

3.name: Wings of Nightmare
3.effect: Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
4.effect: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

5.name: Against the Fleeing Light
5.effect: Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Evernight Raven
6.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

Fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz. Currently serves as an investigator in the Adventurers' Guild.Through her unique abilities, eccentric character, and (while she would never admit it herself) hard work, Fischl has become a rising star among the Adventurers' Guild's investigators, earning the recognition of all.Description from the Official Website[1]

obtain: Event Wish - Adrift in the Harbor

1.name: Dew-Drinker
1.effect: Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

2.name: The Auspicious
2.effect: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

3.name: Cloud-Strider
3.effect: Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Westward Sojourn
4.effect: Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

5.name: The Merciful
5.effect: Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: The Clement
6.effect: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

Ganyu.description:
The secretary to the Liyue Qixing. The blood of both human and illuminated beast flows within her veins.
Graceful and quiet by nature, yet the gentle disposition of qilin sees not even the slightest conflict with even the most arduous of workloads.After all, Ganyu firmly believes that all the work she does is in honor of her contract with Rex Lapis, seeking the well-being of all living things within Liyue.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
1.effect: When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's Inuzaka All-Round Defense is decreased by 2s. This effect can occur once every 10s.

2.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
2.effect: While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

3.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
3.effect: Increases the Level of Inuzaka All-Round Defense by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
4.effect: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

5.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
5.effect: Increases the Level of Juuga: Forward Unto Victory by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
6.effect:
For 12s after using Inuzaka All-Round Defense or Juuga: Forward Unto Victory, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' Geo DMG based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
"Standing Firm": +10%
"Impregnable": +20%
"Crunch": +40%
This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

talents.name: Heedless of the Wind and Weather

Gorou.description: Kindness and loyalty are the representation of virtue. Without a doubt, my friend Gorou is a virtuous general.Kaedehara Kazuha

1.name: Crimson Bouquet
1.effect: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

2.name: Ominous Rainfall
2.effect: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

3.name: Lingering Carmine
3.effect: Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
4.effect: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

5.name: Floral Incense
5.effect: Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Butterfly's Embrace
6.effect: Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.Can only occur once every 60s.

Hu Tao.description: Hu Tao is the 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, a person vital to managing Liyue's funerary affairs.She does her utmost to flawlessly carry out a person's last rites and preserve the world's balance of yin and yang.Aside from this, she is also a talented poet whose many "masterpieces" have passed around Liyue's populace by word of mouth.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Spiraling Tempest
1.effect: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

2.name: People's Aegis
2.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

3.name: When the West Wind Arises
3.effect: Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Lands of Dandelion
4.effect: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

5.name: Outbursting Gust
5.effect: Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
6.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

Jean.description: As the Acting Grand Master of the Knights, Jean has always been devoted to her duties and maintaining peace in Mondstadt.She had taken precautions long before the onset of Stormterror's assault, and she will guard Mondstadt with her life as always.Description from the Official Website[1]

obtain: Event Wish - Leaves in the Wind

1.name: Scarlet Hills
1.effect: Decreases Chihayaburu's CD by 10%.Using Kazuha Slash resets the CD of Chihayaburu.

2.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
2.effect:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by Kazuha Slash has the following effects:
Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200.
Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.
The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

3.name: Maple Monogatari
3.effect: Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Oozora Genpou
4.effect:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
Pressing or Holding Chihayaburu regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

5.name: Wisdom of Bansei
5.effect: Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Crimson Momiji
6.effect: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack by 0.2%.

Kaedehara Kazuha.description:
A wandering samurai from Inazuma with a modest and gentle personality.
Beneath a youthful and carefree demeanor lies a heart that hides a great many burdens from the past. Seemingly easygoing, Kazuha has his own code of conduct.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Excellent Blood
1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

2.name: Never-Ending Performance
2.effect: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

3.name: Dance of Frost
3.effect: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Frozen Kiss
4.effect: Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.Can only occur once every 60s.

5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
5.effect: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
6.effect: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

Kaeya.description: In the Knights of Favonius, Kaeya is the most trusted aide for the Acting Grand Master Jean. You can always count on him to solve any intractable problems. Everyone in Mondstadt loves Kaeya, but no one knows what secrets this witty, charming knight has...Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Snowswept Sakura
1.effect: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

2.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
2.effect: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

3.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
3.effect: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Ebb and Flow
4.effect: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

5.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
5.effect: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Dance of Suigetsu
6.effect: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

Kamisato Ayaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan from Inazuma. Dignified and elegant, wise and determined.Sincere and pleasant to others. Universally loved by the Inazuma people, she has earned the title of Shirasagi Himegimi.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Thundering Might
1.effect: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

2.name: Keen Extraction
2.effect: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.This effect can only occur once every 5s.

3.name: Foreseen Reformation
3.effect: Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Attunement
4.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

5.name: Beckoning Stars
5.effect: Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Tenacious Star
6.effect: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

Keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue ⁠— but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.She firmly believes that humanity's future should be determined by humans themselves, and that they can even do better than the archons and adepti have done for them. In order to prove this, she works harder than anyone else.Description from the Official Website

1.name: Chained Reactions
1.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

2.name: Explosive Frags
2.effect: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

3.name: Exquisite Compound
3.effect: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Sparkly Explosion
4.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

5.name: Nova Burst
5.effect: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Blazing Delight
6.effect: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

Klee.description: Knights of Favonius Spark Knight! Forever with a bang and a flash!—And then disappearing from the stern gaze of Acting Grand Master Jean.Sure, time in solitary confinement gives lots of time to think about new gunpowder formulas...But it'd still be better to not be in solitary in the first place.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Crow's Eye
1.effect: When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of Tengu Stormcall is decreased by 1s.This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

2.name: Dark Wings
2.effect: Unleashing Tengu Stormcall will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

3.name: The War Within
3.effect: Increases the Level of Subjugation: Koukou Sendou by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Conclusive Proof
4.effect: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by Subjugation: Koukou Sendou is increased to 6.

5.name: Spellsinger
5.effect: Increases the Level of Tengu Stormcall by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Sin of Pride
6.effect: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

Kujou Sara.description: Leader of the Tenryou Commission's forces. A charismatic woman who acts as swiftly as a storm wind and always honors her word.She bears the title of "Devotee of the Divine" and has sworn her allegiance to the Raiden Shogun.The eternity that the Shogun pursues is the cause that she is willing to fight for.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Infinite Circuit
1.effect: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

2.name: Electromagnetic Field
2.effect:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

3.name: Resonant Thunder
3.effect: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Plasma Eruption
4.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

5.name: Electrocute
5.effect: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Pulsating Witch
6.effect: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.This effect can only occur once every 5s.

Lisa.description: She is an intellectual witch who can never get enough naps. As the Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, Lisa is smart in that she always knows exactly what to do with whatever troubles her.As much as she loves her sleep, she still manages to keep everything under control in a calm, composed manner.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Prophecy of Submersion
1.effect:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

2.name: Lunar Chain
2.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.This effect can only occur once every 5s.

3.name: Restless Revolution
3.effect: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
4.effect: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

5.name: Mockery of Fortuna
5.effect: Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
6.effect: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

Mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.Though she is often strapped for cash and lives a life of thrift, she is resolved to never use astrology for profit... It is this very resolution that has caused her to constantly fret about money.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Piercing Fragments
1.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

2.name: Shock Effect
2.effect: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.Can occur once every 6s.

3.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
3.effect: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
4.effect: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

5.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
5.effect: Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
6.effect: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

Ningguang.description: Owner of the Jade Chamber in the skies above Liyue, there are stories abound about Ningguang, with her elegance and mysterious smile.As a Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, not only does she embody law and order, she also represents fortune and wit.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: I Got Your Back
1.effect: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

2.name: Combat Maid
2.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

3.name: Invulnerable Maid
3.effect: Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: To Be Cleaned
4.effect: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

5.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
5.effect: Increases the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Must Be Spotless
6.effect: Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

Noelle.description: Like most of Mondstadt's young people, Noelle always dreamed of being a knight of Favonius when she grew up.She may not have what it takes to be a knight just yet, but she is learning. Working as a maid at the Knights' headquarters, she is constantly taking notes on what constitutes knightly speech, knightly conduct, and knightly customs.She holds firm to her belief that one day she will join their ranks — she just needs to keep trying her hardest at everything she does.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Ascetics of Frost
1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

2.name: Frozen to the Bone
2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

3.name: Ascendant Praise
3.effect: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Divine Suppression
4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
5.effect: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Rite of Resurrection
6.effect: Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

Qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. "Blessed" by the adepti with a body that cannot die, this petite zombie cannot do anything without first giving herself orders to do it.Qiqi's memory is like a sieve. Out of necessity, she always carries around a notebook in which she writes anything important that she is sure to forget later.But on her worst days, she even forgets to look at her notebook...Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Ominous Inscription
1.effect: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

2.name: Steelbreaker
2.effect: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents's DEF.

3.name: Shinkage Bygones
3.effect: Increases the Level of Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Pledge of Propriety
4.effect: When the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

5.name: Shogun's Descent
5.effect: Increases the Level of Transcendence: Baleful Omen by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Wishbearer
6.effect: While in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

Raiden Shogun.description:
The Raiden Shogun is the awesome and terrible power of thunder incarnate, the exalted ruler of the Inazuma Shogunate.
With the might of lightning at her disposal, she commits herself to the solitary pursuit of eternity.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Wolf's Instinct
1.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

2.name: Suppression
2.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

3.name: Soul Companion
3.effect: Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Bite
4.effect: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

5.name: Sharpened Claws
5.effect: Increases the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Lupus Fulguris
6.effect: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

Razor.description: Some say he is an orphan raised by wolves. Others say he is a wolf spirit in human form.He is most at home in the wild, fighting with claw and thunder.To this day the wolf boy can be found prowling the forest, where he and his wolf pack hunt to survive using nothing more than their animal instincts.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Unholy Revelation
1.effect: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

2.name: Land Without Promise
2.effect: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

3.name: The Wages of Sin
3.effect: Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Painful Grace
4.effect: Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

5.name: Last Rites
5.effect: Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Divine Retribution
6.effect: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

Rosaria.description: Rosaria, a sister in Mondstadt's Church of Favonius.A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. An unusual woman with sharp, piercing words and a cold manner.Her movements are unpredictable. She often leaves without notifying anyone. She acts with some kind of purpose, but others don't seem to know exactly what she stands for...Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: At Water's Edge
1.effect: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

2.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
2.effect:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
Kurage's Oath Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
Nereid's Ascension Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

3.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
3.effect: Increases the Level of Nereid's Ascension by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
4.effect: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

5.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
5.effect: Increases the Level of Kurage's Oath by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Sango Isshin
6.effect: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s after her Normal and Charged Attacks heal a character with 80% or more HP.

Sangonomiya Kokomi.description:
Kokomi is the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, and also serves as its supreme leader.She is well-versed in the art of war, is good at strategizing, and has keen insights into military affairs. She is also adept at handling domestic affairs, diplomacy, and other matters.
Still, this unfathomable leader has a mysterious side to her...Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
1.effect: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

2.name: Egress Prep
2.effect:
Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash gains the following effects:
DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Tapping (mobile)/Press (PC & PlayStation) Mode increased by 3.3%.
Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

3.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
3.effect: Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Skiving: New and Improved
4.effect: Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.This effect occurs once every 2s.

5.name: Speed Comes First
5.effect: Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Sleep O'Clock
6.effect:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

Sayu.description: Sayu, Shuumatsuban's resident ninja, is obsessed with sleeping and growing taller.She has mastered all kinds of ninjutsu to run away and hide in pursuit of opportunities to laze around and sleep.Such an extraordinary skillset may have very unexpected uses.Description from the Official Website[1]

Shenhe.description: One has traversed many realms and taken a great many pupils. Among them, Shenhe breaks the closest resemblance to oneself. Were she not a mortal, one would like to have her stay by my side.Cloud Retainer

1.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
1.effect: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

2.name: Beth: Unbound Form
2.effect: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

3.name: Flawless Alchemistress
3.effect: Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Alchemania
4.effect: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

5.name: Caution: Standard Flask
5.effect: Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Chaotic Entropy
6.effect: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

Sucrose.description: An alchemist with an insatiable curiosity towards the world and everything in it. Attached to the Knights of Favonius as an assistant to Albedo, her area of focus is "bio-alchemy."She strives to enrich the world by transforming living things with the power of alchemy.Granted, the products of her research sometimes prove to be more weird than wonderful — but on the whole, she has made monumental contributions to the field of bio-alchemy.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
1.effect: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%

2.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
2.effect: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

3.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
3.effect: Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
4.effect: If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

5.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
5.effect: Increases the Level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Havoc: Annihilation
6.effect: When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset.This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

Tartaglia.description:
Meet Tartaglia — the cunning Snezhnayan whose unpredictable personality keeps people guessing his every move.
Don't be under any illusion as to what he might be thinking or what his intentions are. Just remember this: Behind that innocent, childlike exterior lies a finely honed instrument of war.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: A Comrade's Duty
1.effect: When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own Blazing Blessing CD is decreased by 3s, while his own Crimson Ooyoroi's CD is decreased by 3s.This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

2.name: A Subordinate's Skills
2.effect: Crimson Ooyoroi's duration is increased by 3s.

3.name: Fortified Resolve
3.effect: Increases the Level of Blazing Blessing by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Long-Term Planning
4.effect: After using Crimson Ooyoroi, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

5.name: Raging Wildfire
5.effect: Increases the Level of Crimson Ooyoroi by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Burning Heart
6.effect: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

Thoma.description: The housekeeper of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan, and a well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.Friendly and approachable, Thoma fits in with the crowd easily wherever he is.At first glance, he seems to be a very easygoing person, but he is in fact very responsible. He has an extraordinarily serious side, be it in his work or his interpersonal communications.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Spring Thunder of Fertility
1.effect: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.

2.name: Violet Vehemence
2.effect: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

3.name: Distant Crackling
3.effect: Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Fickle Cloudstrike
4.effect: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

5.name: Clamor in the Wilds
5.effect: Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: World-Shaker
6.effect: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will significantly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, dealing 200% of its original DMG, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.

Traveler.description:
The keeper is fading away; the creator has not yet come.
But the world shall burn no more, for you shall ascend.In-game character profile text[Note 1]

1.name: Splitting Gales
1.effect: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
2.effect: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
3.effect: Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
4.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
5.effect: Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Storm of Defiance
6.effect: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

Venti.description: A bard that seems to have arrived on some unknown wind — sometimes sings songs as old as the hills, and other times sings poems fresh and new.Likes apples and lively places but is not a fan of cheese or anything sticky.When using his Anemo power to control the wind, it often appears as feathers, as he's fond of that which appears light and breezy.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
1.effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

2.name: Oil Meets Fire
2.effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

3.name: Deepfry
3.effect: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Slowbake
4.effect: Pyronado's duration is increased by 40%.

5.name: Guoba Mad
5.effect: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Condensed Pyronado
6.effect: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

Xiangling.description: The Head Chef at the Wanmin Restaurant and also a waitress there, Xiangling is extremely passionate about cooking and excels at her signature hot and spicy dishes.Though still young, Xiangling is a true master of the culinary arts with all the skills of a kitchen veteran. She enjoys a good reputation among the hearty eaters at Chihu Rock.There's absolutely no need to be nervous if she wants you to sample her latest creation. It will not disappoint. Promise.Description from the Official Website[1]

obtain: Event Wish - Invitation to Mundane Life

1.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
1.effect: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

2.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
2.effect: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

3.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
3.effect: Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
4.effect: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

5.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
5.effect: Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
6.effect: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

talents.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons

Xiao.description: One of the mighty and illuminated adepti guarding Liyue, also heralded as the "Vigilant Yaksha."Despite his youthful appearance, tales of his exploits have been documented for millennia.He is especially fond of Wangshu Inn's Almond Tofu.This is because it tastes just like the sweet dreams he used to devour.Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: The Scent Remained
1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

2.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
2.effect: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

3.name: Weaver of Verses
3.effect: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Evilsoother
4.effect: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

5.name: Embrace of Rain
5.effect: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
6.effect: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

Xingqiu.description: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild, Xingqiu has had a reputation for being studious and polite ever since he was a young child.But there is another side to the mild-mannered Xingqiu everyone knows. A daring, adventurous and much more mischievous side...Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: Fatal Acceleration
1.effect: Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.Can only occur once every 5s.

2.name: Impromptu Opening
2.effect: Riff Revolution's Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

3.name: Double-Stop
3.effect: Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Wildfire Rhythm
4.effect: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

5.name: Screamin' for an Encore
5.effect: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
6.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

talents.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."

Xinyan.description: Rock 'n' roll is an avant-garde art in Liyue Harbor and Xinyan is the pioneer in this field.She rebels against ossified prejudices, using her music and passionate singing to awaken dazed souls fatigued by worldly matters.If you get the chance, do not miss out on her next performance!Description from the Official Website[1]

1.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
1.effect: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

2.name: Right of Final Interpretation
2.effect: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

3.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
3.effect: Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Supreme Amnesty
4.effect: When Done Deal is used:Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

5.name: Abiding Affidavit
5.effect: Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Extra Clause
6.effect: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

Yanfei.description: A half-illuminated beast and highly-skilled legal adviser.She combines adherence to the legal codices and reasonable flexibility to find the perfect balance in her work. She devotes herself to protecting the fairness of contracts in Liyue with her identity as a legal adviser and her unique experience and methods.Description from the Official Website[1]

obtain: Event Wish - Tapestry of Golden Flames

1.name: Agate Ryuukin
1.effect: The Aurous Blaze created by Ryuukin Saxifrage lasts for an extra 4s.Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

2.name: A Procession of Bonfires
2.effect: When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

3.name: Trickster's Flare
3.effect: Increase the Level of Niwabi Fire-Dance by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
4.effect: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, Niwabi Fire-Dance's CD is decreased by 1.2.

5.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
5.effect: Increases the Level of Ryuukin Saxifrage by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
6.effect: During Niwabi Fire-Dance, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Kindling Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

Yoimiya.description:
A talented pyrotechnician. The current owner of Naganohara Fireworks known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival."
A girl filled with fiery passion. The uncompromising childish innocence and the obsession with craftsmanship intertwine in her to create a spectacular blaze.Description from the Official Website[1]

Yun Jin.description: One performance by Yun Jin at our tea house rakes in enough Mora that we won't have to open for a whole month!Fan Er'ye of Heyu Tea House

1.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.

2.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
2.effect: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

3.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
3.effect: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
4.effect: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

5.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
5.effect: Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
6.effect: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

Zhongli.description:
Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's mysterious consultant. Handsome, elegant, and surpassingly learned.
Though no one knows where Zhongli is from, he is a master of courtesy and rules. From his seat at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, he performs all manner of rituals.Description from the Official Website[1]
